message: I'm feeling generous, but I need most of the money to start my business.  What do you think?
I'm willing to give you a decent amount, but I need some for my own projects. Take it or leave it!
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can find a more even split.  Let's try 60/40 this time.
I'll give you a slight edge, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
Let's meet in the middle this time. I'm willing to go down to 550k, but I need to get a decent share of this.
I'm not getting any younger, let's get this done!
